Class PairGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • PairGame

  • public class PairGame
extends java.lang.Object
    PairGame is a game that consists of two clients(ServerHandle) objects This is sort of the game controller that keeps score and other information

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PairGame(ServerHandle userOne, ServerHandle userTow)
      Constructor takes two ServerHandle objects (clients) to create a pair for the game.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • PairGame

        public PairGame(ServerHandle userOne,
                ServerHandle userTow)
        Constructor takes two ServerHandle objects (clients) to create a pair for the game. Creats a Hashmap of all the questions and answers from the file "src/question.txt"
        Parameters:
        userOne - ServerHandle object for user one
        userTow - ServerHandle object for user two

    • Method Detail

      • getQuestion

        public java.lang.String getQuestion()
        Gets a String containing a random question from the HashMap of the questions. Stores the answer (toLowerCase) in the answer field
        Returns:

      • sendQuestionToClient

        public void sendQuestionToClient()
        Get a question and send it to both clients

        public void increaseUserOnePoint()
        Increase the points of player one

      • getUserOnePoint

        public int getUserOnePoint()
        Get the current score of user one
        Returns:
        the score of user one stored in userOnePoint field

      • increaseUserTowPoint

        public void increaseUserTowPoint()
        Increase the score of user two

      • getUserTwoPoint

        public int getUserTwoPoint()
        Get the current score of user two
        Returns:
        the score of user one stored in userTwoPoint field

      • checkAnswer

        public void checkAnswer()
        Check the received answers and if a user has correct answer. increase that users score. Reset the number of answers and if still not played all questions send a new question to the clients. If the game is over check the results

      • result

        public void result()
        Check which user is the winner and send the users the result by calling the methods corresponding.

      • setUserOneAnswer

        public void setUserOneAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
        Setter for the user one answer field
        Parameters:
        answer - the answer received from user one

        Increases the number of answers received

      • getNumberOfAnswer

        public int getNumberOfAnswer()
        Get the number of answers received
        Returns:
        the number of answers currently in the field numberOfAnswers

      • setNumberOfAnswerToZero

        public void setNumberOfAnswerToZero()
        Reset the number of answers to zero. Used when a new question is generated

      • ifAllUserHasAnswered

        public boolean ifAllUserHasAnswered()
        Boolean that returns true if numberOfAnswers ==2
        Returns:
        true or false

      • leavesGame

        public void leavesGame(java.lang.String userName)
        When a user leaves the game this method is called to inform the other user in the game of this
        Parameters:
        userName - the userName of the leaving client
